pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoDrops Butter Menthol 42 Lozenges
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoDrops Butter Menthol lozenges soothes the throat, clears the nose. 

- Vicks VapoDrops temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose. It soothes the throat and clears the nose.
- For the throat: The proven Vicks medications soothes and cools irritated throats.
- For the nose: Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages - fast.
- Available in 4 flavours: Original Menthol, Butter Menthol, Burst of Mint and Cooling Peppermint
- Standard sizes: 10 drops | 24 drops | 27 drops | 30 drops
- Now available in Mega Value Pack in 2 flavours - Original Menthol and Butter Menthol.


Vicks VapoDrops will quickly relieve the "throat tickle" that precedes a coughing fit and could prevent you from using your voice with confidence! The lozenges will help to clear nose and soothe your throat. Feel the effect in seconds!

Size: 42 Lozenges

KEY FEATURES

• Temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose.
• For the throat: The proven Vicks medication soothes and cools irritated throats.
• For the nose: Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages - fast.
• Soothes the throat, clears the nose

Warnings

Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Keep out of reach of children. Do not purchase if bag is open.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredient per lozenge: Menthol 7.0mg

Contains: Glucose - Liquid and Sucrose

Directions

Take 1-2 lozenges every 2-3 hours as needed.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place.
